alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Mainland Hyde; Northern Craven; Pamlico; Southern Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 01 at 7:09AM EDT until October 01 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Up to 1 to 2 feet of of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas along the Pamlico Sound, Trent, Bay and lower Neuse Rivers, and adjacent tidal creeks, areas along the Pamlico and Pungo Rivers and adjacent tidal creeks, areas along the Pamlico Sound, Pungo and lower Pamlico Rivers, and areas along the lower Neuse River, Swift Creek, and adjacent tidal creeks. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * IMPACTS..Up to 1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level is possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways resulting in a low threat of property damage. Some roads and low lying property including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes adjacent to the waterfront will experience shallow flooding.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Mainland Hyde; Northern Craven; Pamlico; Southern Craven
